metadata.title: USN-3810-1 -- ppp vulnerability
metadata.description: Ivan Gotovchits discovered that ppp incorrectly handled the EAP-TLS protocol. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause ppp to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly bypass authentication.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3810-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ppp - 2.4.7-1+2ubuntu1.16.04.1 ppp-udeb - 2.4.7-1+2ubuntu1.16.04.1 ppp-dev - 2.4.7-1+2ubuntu1.16.04.1 No subscription required
